short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Game of Thrones Wallpaper turn new tab to custom Game of Thrones background. Game of Thrones wallpaper theme for fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Automatically shuffle Game of Thrones wallpapers with every new tab.  
2. Randomize Game of Thrones backgrounds or mark your favorites via the wallpaper selection panel.  
3. Integrated Google search bar for quick browsing.  
4. Convenient shortcuts to your emails and social media platforms.  
5. Display the current date and time automatically.  
6. Create and save tasks with the built-in New Note feature.  
7. Quick access to your most visited websites.  
8. Seamlessly reach your bookmarks with a single click.  
9. Add websites to the Shortcut panel for faster navigation.  
10. One-click access to Google apps.  
11. Explore additional themes effortlessly.  
12. Share content easily on social media.  
13. Download wallpapers directly with a quick access button.  
14. Instantly play games from the tab.  
15. Add fun animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, or fireworks to your Game of Thrones new tab experience.
